Jan 3 (Reuters) - :
*AMAZON TELLS SINGAPORE ARBITRATOR INDIA ANTITRUST SUSPENSION OF 2019 FUTURE DEAL DOESN’T MEAN TRANSACTION IS VOID-SOURCE *AMAZON TELLS SINGAPORE ARBITRATOR THERE ARE MANY GROUNDS TO CHALLENGE INDIA ANTITRUST SUSPENSION OF 2019 FUTURE DEAL-SOURCE *AMAZON TELLS SINGAPORE ARBITRATOR THAT INDIA ANTITRUST BODY ACTED BEYOND ITS POWERS BY SUSPENDING 2019 FUTURE DEAL-SOURCE *Further company coverage: FRTL.NS

  • ((Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com;))
